text:
August 29, 1963
Mrs. Robert L. Allen
70 LaSalle Street
Apartment 13F
Hew York 27, Hew York
Dear Mrs. Allen:
We are glad to know that you and Professor Allen will have an opportunity
to review the scripts whcih are being prepared for the Radio English Teaching
series which we are developing for the Vbice of America.
The first sixteen scripts are now ready for review and are attached to this
letter. We look forward to receiving your evaluation shortly. We expect
to send the additional scripts within the next week.
Sincerely,
James A. Fellows
Assistant Director
JAFssc
Enclosure
